definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

pinyin: yan2 zhong4 ji2 xing4 hu1 xi1 xi4 tong3 zong1 he2 zheng4
containing_words.word: 严重急性呼吸系统综合症

sentences.english: To observe the curative effects on chronic diseases of respiratory system treated by "winter disease being cured in summer".
sentences.chinese: 观察“冬病夏治”治疗慢性呼吸系统疾病的疗效。

sentences.english: The most widespread children's illnesses were those that affected their respiratory systems.
sentences.chinese: 婴幼儿最易患的是呼吸系统疾病。

sentences.english: R36/37Irritating to eyes and respiratory system.
Chronic cough is a common respiratory symptom in children.
sentences.chinese: 慢性咳嗽是儿童呼吸系统常见的症状。

sentences.english: You catch a cold when a virus infects your upper respiratory system.
sentences.chinese: 当上呼吸系统感染了病毒，人就会得感冒。

sentences.english: The flu, or influenza, is caused by a virus that affects the respiratory system.
sentences.chinese: 流感是有病毒引起的呼吸系统疾病。

sentences.english: Also, the prevalence of respiratory illness in children livi…
sentences.chinese: 同样，某些呼吸系统疾病患病率也是前者高于后者。

sentences.english: R37/38Irritating to respiratory system and skin.
Lung paralysis can occur up to ten days after a bite by an elapid (member of the cobra family).Death usually comes about by means of respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 咬伤十天后肺部可能麻痹，呼吸系统衰竭导致死亡。

sentences.english: Passive smoking impairs the respiratory health of hundreds of thousand of children.
sentences.chinese: 被动吸烟损害了成千上万孩子的呼吸系统健康。

sentences.english: Lung paralysis can occur up to ten days after a bite by an elapid (member of the cobra family). Death usually comes about by means of respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 咬伤十天后肺部可能麻痹，呼吸系统衰竭导致死亡。

sentences.english: The purpose of this course is to teach various infectious and non- infectious avian respiratory diseases.
sentences.chinese: 本课程主要教导各种家禽呼吸系统传染性疾病。

sentences.english: It stimulates the cardio-respiratory system and it's non-weight bearing.
sentences.chinese: 这种锻炼方式刺激了心脏呼吸系统，同时不负重。

sentences.english: Its name, the Middle East Respiratory System Coronavirus.
sentences.chinese: 它的名字是中东呼吸系统冠状病毒。

sentences.english: SO2 can affect the respiratory system and the functions of the lungs, and causes irritation of the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化硫可影响呼吸系统和肺功能，并刺激眼睛。

sentences.english: At necropsy the respiratory system is severely affected.
sentences.chinese: 剖检可见呼吸系统有严重感染。

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
